name: Renovation Plan
description:
Come and immerse yourself in this relaxing and leisurely home decoration game!The lovely cartoon art style and soothing background music will bring you a relaxed and pleasant game experience.

Dear decorator, a task full of challenges and fun awaits you.According to the design drawing, put various furniture in the proper place, showing your aesthetics and skills.Each room has different usage scenarios, from bedroom to living room, from kitchen to bathroom, you need to choose the appropriate furniture and decoration style according to different scenarios.Not only that, there are also gorgeous large apartments waiting for you to challenge.

Come and try it, let's find the fun of decoration in this game together!
